archimate:Requirement.name: IM.2.2.5b: b) using secure packaging techniques (e.g. the use of opaque envelopes; double packaging; or specialist packaging to protect contents from exposure to heat, moisture or electromagnetic fields)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
